Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 97th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2015...
Injured on 4/9/2015 with a Concussion, out for one week...
Traded from Cincinnati to Philadelphia on 2/17/2016 (Going to CIN: 3B Edward Clinard. Going to PHI: DH Asa Kelemen, RF Donald Lamberth, 3B Walter Womac)...
Traded from Philadelphia to San Francisco on 2/1/2017 (Going to SF: LF Donald Lamberth, 3B Asa Kelemen, RF Fred Bondurant. Going to PHI: RF Manuel Cambra)...
Injured on 4/21/2017 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 9/15/2017, off Barry Sechrist (STL)...
Traded from San Francisco to St. Louis (C) on 7/15/2018 (Going to STL: 2B Michael Holgate, LF Micheal Dore, RF Donald Lamberth, P Brian Eppinger. Going to SF: 2B Maurice Sydnor, P Barry Sechrist, P
Lino Gonzalez, P Alfonso Rodriguez)...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Montreal on 3/2/2019 (Going to MON: 1B Donald Lamberth, LF Brett Godby. Going to STL: 3B Tyler Hazel, C John Searles)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/25/2019, off Zachary Carrero (COL)...
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 2/25/2020.
Injured on 7/15/2020 with a Fractured Hand, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 5/29/2021 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 8/24/2021 with a Sore Knee, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 3/1/2022 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 4/22/2022 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Released by San Francisco on 10/20/2022...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 6/30/2024 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
